title: Damon: The End
description: Recently edited to correct grammar errors, this Novella by B.P. Elkins is a Sci-fi/fantasy adventure. Not part of a series but a standalone book that tells the end of one mans journy. The End is complete at 17,800 words.After 100 years of fighting it’s finally over, I completed my contract. 100 years of service to the Canvas cause (prevent the human apocalypse) in exchange for one life resurrected. They’ll bring my wife back to life. Tham, she’s all I ever think about.It’s over she should be here, but as the clock ticks down and the contract expires she isn’t. She’s still off in never never land.My name is Damon Rosh and this is the end. This is 100 years of work, cumulating to my final fight. I may not know the odds, but I do know I won’t stop until I have her, or I’m dead.
author: B.P. Elkins
